name: Birdmancer
description:
Currently has 5 arenas

Controls :

WASD / ZQSD / Arrow key =  movement

C / K = attack

Hold  X / L = Bird form

When in bird form, you take more damage, but your stamina refills faster and you can move faster

Made in roughly 2-3 days for mini jam 99

Like what you see ? :)

Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord ( NOTE : There may be a bug where on replaying the game, the first door doesn't spawn. Please refresh the page or close and open the windows application to play again )
